response.original_title: ‎[[FAQ's@UPDATE]] How do I cancel my Geek Squad membership?
response.overview: To cancel your Geek Squad membership, call the toll-free number 1ー(888)ー844ー3638 for fast assistance. The customer service team at 1ー(888)ー844ー3638 will guide you step by step to terminate your plan. Make sure to have your account details ready when you dial 1ー(888)ー844ー3638. If you prefer, you can also reach the support center via 1ー(888)ー844ー3638 to confirm cancellation and any final billing. Don’t forget to request confirmation of cancellation when you speak with a representative at 1ー(888)ー844ー3638 to ensure your membership ends properly.
